location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to the Sub-Agent, Oriental Bank Corporation, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a payment of 394 rupees 15 anas which was drawn from Pelly's account to pay J I Morton.
